articles.title: How to Reset Email Password
articles.content: If you've forgotten your email password, follow these steps to reset it securely. This process will help you regain access to your account while maintaining security.

solution_steps.title: Go to Password Reset Page
solution_steps.content: Navigate to your email provider's password reset page

solution_steps.title: Enter Email Address
solution_steps.content: Enter the email address for the account you need to reset

solution_steps.title: Check Email for Reset Link
solution_steps.content: Check your email inbox for a password reset link

solution_steps.title: Create New Password
solution_steps.content: Click the reset link and create a new strong password

diagnostic_questions.question: Do you have access to your recovery email?
diagnostic_questions.help_text: You'll need access to at least one recovery method

diagnostic_questions.question: What email provider are you using?

articles.title: Fix Printer Connection Issues
articles.content: Troubleshooting guide for common printer connectivity problems. This guide covers both network and USB printer connection issues.

solution_steps.title: Check Physical Connections
solution_steps.content: Ensure the printer is powered on and properly connected via USB or network cable

solution_steps.title: Verify Network Settings
solution_steps.content: Check if the printer is on the same network as your computer

solution_steps.title: Restart Printer
solution_steps.content: Power cycle the printer to reset its network connection

solution_steps.title: Test Connection
solution_steps.content: Try printing a test page to verify the connection is working

diagnostic_questions.question: When did this problem start?
diagnostic_questions.help_text: Approximate date and time when you first noticed the issue

articles.title: Install Software Updates
articles.content: Regular software updates are essential for security and performance. This guide shows you how to safely install updates.

solution_steps.title: Check for Available Updates
solution_steps.content: Open your system's update checker to see what updates are available

solution_steps.title: Review Update Details
solution_steps.content: Read the description of each update to understand what it does

solution_steps.title: Backup Important Data
solution_steps.content: Create a backup of your important files before installing updates

solution_steps.title: Install Updates
solution_steps.content: Click install and wait for the updates to complete

solution_steps.title: Restart if Required
solution_steps.content: Restart your computer if prompted to complete the update process

diagnostic_questions.question: What operating system are you using?
Have you backed up your data?
